column2: A Personal guard to a noble
You are a King without an Elite Guard.
Your Guard Corps is lacking so you can name one of the Realm.
One of the Guards is errant.
Your Liege has too many Guard Corps.
All your martial practice as improved your skill.
In the midst of battle, you see that one of the enemy commanders is open to attack, you could charge in and strike.
No need for personal glory, we will win the day regardless.
Determine a winner of the duel round.
[dueler1.GetFirstName] strikes away your weapon, forcing you to your knee. [dueler1.GetSheHe] lifts the blade for a killing stroke.
[From.GetFirstName] drops [From.GetHerHis] weapon and throws up [From.GetHerHis] hands in surrender.
You twist your weapon and disarm [dueler1.GetFirstName]. But as you ready a strike, [dueler1.GetFirstName] throws [dueler1.GetHerHis] hands up in surrender.
You drive your blade deep into [dueler1.GetFirstName]'s guts and [dueler1.GetsSheHe] falls face down, leaving an expanding pool of blood.
You drive your blade deep into [dueler1.GetFirstName]'s guts. But the blade shatters with the piercing. Rather than death, [dueler1.GetHerHis] figure fades and an ill wind blows through the area.
You watch on as [dueler2.GetFirstName] twists [dueler2.GetHerHis] weapon and disarms you. As [dueler2.GetFirstName] readies a killing strike, you throw up your hands and declare surrender

You watch on as [dueler2.GetFirstName] twists [dueler2.GetHerHis] weapon and disarms You. You can only watch as [dueler2.GetFirstName]'s weapon tears into your torso. You fall into the dirt as your life fades in an expanding pool of blood.

You watch on as [dueler2.GetFirstName] twists [dueler2.GetHerHis] weapon and disarms You. You can only watch as [dueler2.GetFirstName]'s weapon tears into your torso. The weapon bursts into pieces with the strike and your spirit enters the aether to be reborn in time.
You close the gap with [dueler2.GetFirstName], who takes up a guard position. So you decide to attack with...
[dueler1.GetFirstName] closed with you, putting you on the defensive and readies an attack. So you decide to defend with...
